sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedServiceService } from 'src/app/shared-service.service'; import { Patient } from '../Patient'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-patients', templateUrl: './add-patients.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-patients.component.css'] }) export class AddPatientsComponent { p:Patient=new Patient(0,"","","","","","","",0,new Date(),new Date(),new Date()) x:number=0 constructor(private db:SharedServiceService){} addUser(){ console.log(this.p); this.db.addUser(this.p).subscribe(x=>{ this.x=x; console.log(x); }) } }
